content: an easy beginner crochet blanket designed for red heart granny square all in one yarn go with the flow of color changes to create exciting stripes in simple moss stitch- no cutting or controlling of colors needed the baby blanket pictured used 2 skeins of red heart granny square all in one yarn in the soft white citrus twist colorway 100% acrylic 417 yards 381 m per 250-gram skein that is 834 yards 762 meters of yarn you can add a third skein of yarn to make a small throw-sized blanket you can make your blanket wider you want by adjusting the number of starting chains any odd number of starting chains works for this pattern any even number of stitches in each row hook 8 mm us l11 gauge 11 5 stitches = 4 inches 10 cm 12 row = 4 inches 10 cm stitches required chain and single_crochet in us terms the whole blanket uses moss stitch which is a repeating single_crochet chain 1 pattern moss stitch is sometimes called linen stitch add the second skein whenever the first skein runs out and don t worry if it starts on a different color share your blanket with #thelivelyblanket on instagram tag me @prettypeacefulcrochet because i love to see your blankets please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as the lively blanket crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or youtube thank you for your support
